dcterms:description: A dataset for text-based person search, containing 11,206 scene images and 15,080 person boxes with 5,532 different IDs in the training set, along with 2,900 person boxes in the query set. Each person box is annotated with text descriptions.
dcterms:title: CUHK-SYSU-TBPS

dcterms:creator: L. Zheng

dcterms:description: A dataset for text-based person search, consisting of 5,704 images and 14,897 person boxes with 483 different IDs in the training set, and 2,056 boxes in the query set. Each person box is annotated with text descriptions.
dcterms:title: PRW-TBPS
